transactionTypes.name: Sales Revenue
transactionTypes.description: Income from sales of goods and services.

transactionTypes.name: Cost of Goods Sold
transactionTypes.description: Direct costs attributable to the production of goods and services sold by a company.

transactionTypes.name: Rent
transactionTypes.description: Costs associated with renting property or equipment.

transactionTypes.name: Salaries
transactionTypes.description: Payments made to employees for services rendered.

transactionTypes.name: Depreciation
transactionTypes.description: Reduction in the value of an asset over time, which does not involve an actual outflow of cash.

transactionTypes.name: Accrued Expenses
transactionTypes.description: Expenses that a business has incurred but has not yet paid, which do not involve an actual outflow of cash until paid.

transactionTypes.name: Unrealized Gains/Losses
transactionTypes.description: Increases or decreases in the value of an asset that has not yet been sold, which do not involve an actual inflow or outflow of cash.

transactionTypes.name: Dividends
transactionTypes.description: Payments made to shareholders, representing a distribution of profits. This is considered a cash flow transaction and is an outflow of cash from the company.
